thread.title: Singapore and Thailand timelapse footage will transport you right there
thread.title_full: Singapore and Thailand timelapse footage will transport you right there | Daily Mail Online

author: Jake Polden For Mailonline
title: Singapore and Thailand timelapse footage will transport you right there
text:
View
comments
The unprecedented beauty of Singapore and Thailand was captured in stunning timelapse footage.
The video, which was posted to YouTube, was named Thaimland and opens on an artistic shot of the clouds dispersing over a beach.
What follows is a sunset filmed from the Thai shoreline â€“ the camera captures the incredible orange light fading as boats moored up for the night bob gently in the wind.
Stunning timelapse footage of Thailand and Singapore The sunset was filmed from a shoreline in Thailand and shows a number of people walking down the beach
A lone swing sits still and a couple look out at the water as darkness begins to encapsulate the entire area
People walk around the beach as a lone swing sits still and darkness finally encapsulates the entire area.
 Mesmerising footage captures ghostly waterfall made entirely... Drone captures mesmerising footage of humpback whale... Terrifying video captures planes tilting sideways and... Eau de tiger! Siberian big cat marks its territory by... Later the camera captures footage of traffic on a busy road as a number of locals attempt to go about their daily routines.
Inside a shopping centre more of the same is caught on camera.
The camera captured the incredible orange light fading as boats moored up for the night bobbed gently in the wind
Footage of traffic on a busy road is captured as a number of locals attempt to go about their daily routines
Hundreds of people rush around in every direction after walking from an escalator and in the background a large screen flickers as it displays numerous digital advertisements.
Moving back outside, the camera films the bright city lights emanating from skyscrapers.
While in the fore front of the shot, a number of boats negotiate a river.
The camera films the bright city lights emanating from skyscrapers and captures boats negotiating the river
The video concludes with a shot of the Gardens by the Bay in Singapore and captures the Supertree Grove.
Standing at heights between 82 and 160 foot, the huge tree-like structures harness solar power and photosynthesize like real plants.
They look to mimic the other plants they provide shelter for and, according to the video, light up blue in the night.
The video concludes with a shot of the Gardens by the Bay in Singapore and captures the Supertree Grove
